channel.title: Need help making a client
channel.description:
Ok guys, i need help making a client, i don'teven no where to start LOL!
im guessing i need a 317 client? As a base? Also can i have the client so it only connects to my server? Or is that like impossible?
All help will be grateful! (And put in credits of client when it get finished. Ooh getting ahead of myself :p)
Thankyou verymuch guys, johno
(p.s if i said something wrong here like 317 client, dnt take piss out of me im here for help nt a put down.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 09:34:22 am[/size][hr]nvm guys, ive got my own client, now ive got to make my own server Ooh complicated lol
